5.75.text: Today's immunisation day in the clinic

9.25.text: so it's about as packed as it's possible to be, I don't think you could cram another

12.64.text:
mother and baby into this place right
now. You can see how important this

17.04.text: is for the local community but at the same time there are still

20.88.text:
paper wasps buzzing around everyone's
head, there's a nest

24.29.text: right above my head and also of course the bats

27.39.text: are still up there above us and all that guano - you can still smell it

30.53.text:
Hopefully though all of that is about to
change
